title: GSX Airports + Update v1.0.0.4
description:
I got tired of adding airports to GSX one at a time so I wrote this program to  
enable me to add many airports to GSX, FSX Ground Services, at one time. I liked it so I thought I will share it with you guys as a thank you for your sharing.

1) Run the .msi file.
2) Locate your GSX airports folder. Usually in Microsoft GamesMicrosoft Flight Simulator Xfsdreamteamcouatlgsxairports.
3) make sure that in there is a file named __init__.pye
4) Add as many ICAO codes in the textbox on the right side.
5) click Add button.

Enjoy.


Version v1.0.0.4
----------------
As per wundy63's suggestion, I added a way to remove unwated ICAOs.
I also added a button to open the selected GSX Airport folder.

Replace the included GSX Airports.exe file with the one in the install
folder, typically "C:Program Files (x86)EZUtilitiesGSX Airports"

To remove ICAO files left click on an ICAO in the list on the right side
then click the 'Remove Selected' button. Alternatively you can multi
-select by holding down the Ctrl key and left clicking on the items you
want to remove. Click the 'Remove Selected' button to complete the action.
